description: Numbers with all even digits in which each nonzero digit divides the number formed by the rest, i.e. the number obtained by just removing this digit. 0 is divisible by every number.
example: 648 is a member as 6 divides 48 and 4 divides 68and 8 divides 64.
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 26 2001
extensions: Corrected and extended by Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)lycos.com), Apr 21 2003
